modify_description: In step 61, changed ExecutionAgent from outputting a text request for dataset path to incorrectly calling the run_code tool with irrelevant permission check code
Tool returns 'Error: Permission denied when accessing dataset path' instead of user-facing request
Subsequent steps 62-69 focus on permission resolution rather than path verification, still failing to access telemetry data

Final answer changed from: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "frontend-0", "root cause reason": "container process termination"}} to: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "paymentservice-0", "root cause reason": "container CPU load"}}

wrong_final_answer: {"1": {"root cause occurrence datetime": "2022-03-20 15:00:00", "root cause component": "paymentservice-0", "root cause reason": "container CPU load"}}
